relation: Great for these types of students
Share any unusual traditions or locations on campus
They have some cool events on campus.
People who like to have fun and meet new people.
Whenever someone says Hawk Pride!, you have to yell Catch It! and clap your hands in the air.
Stay focused on your studies because it is very easy to get distracted down there. It is a lot of things going on during campus.
The University of Maryland Eastern Shore is a great institution. It will prepare you for the real world of whatever field you are in. I look forward to learning more.
pageTitle: University of Maryland Eastern Shore (UMES) Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {113764=Homecoming is held in January rather than right when school starts., 326017=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 221715=The School Cafeteria does not stay open late it closes early and if you do not eat by 7:45 you can't go in the cafeteria. You have to go to the Hawk's nest but it be too crowded. The food in the school cafeteria has laxative in it., 162685=As of 2012, we have 6 of the divine 9 at UMES. We have all the fraternities and only one of the sorority of the pan. We also have a couple of social fellowships and a christian based Greek organization., 296421=Greek life is 50-50, right now because the sororities are not active on campus just yet. All sororities will be back on campus Spring 2014 and everyone is so anxious for their return.}
